list.name: Changes
list.comment: Added is_server_reachable function that checks if the MLFlow server uri written into the code is reachable for 5 seconds. If not, it will run normally on local computer, if connected, will connect and log the training to MLFlow server.

changelist.comment: Added is_server_reachable function that checks if the MLFlow server uri written into the code is reachable for 5 seconds. If not, it will run normally on local computer, if connected, will connect and log the training to MLFlow server.
